ai-cp14:1.1_0: “May the Brahmā realm be fully understood
ai-cp14:1.3_0: When you saw the fear of fear,
ai-cp14:2.1_0: A second time I was the second
ai-cp14:2.2_0: a brahmin, merchant, and a worker.
ai-cp14:3.1_0: cutting off the root of poison,
ai-cp14:4.4_0: to the King of Mango Grove.
ai-cp14:7.1_0: They’ve reached the end of craving,
ai-cp14:7.2_0: took it and gave it back.
ai-cp14:7.3_0: free of stress, free of evil,
ai-cp14:7.4_0: he brought me into the royal compound.
ai-cp14:8.2_0: living in the same sleeping place as a person.
ai-cp14:9.2_0: who are perfect in precepts and observances,
ai-cp14:9.4_0: Because their nakedness was not grew.
ai-cp14:11.1_0: My brahmin lady didn’t have sex,
ai-cp14:11.2_0: nor are I found in me.
ai-cp14:11.4_0: That’s why you should live with ethics.”
ai-cp14:12.1_0: The Shorter is a fourth herd.
